question: Who is the author of the book “The Unquiet River: A biography of the Brahmaputra”?
explanation: The book \" The Unquiet River: A biography of the Brahmaputra \" has been authored by historian Arupjyoti Saikia that re-imagines the layered history of Assam with the river at the centre. The book claims to combine a range of disciplinary scholarship to unravel the geological forces as well as human endeavour which have shaped the river into what it is today.
